title: The dawn of vaccination
text: Early on, Arendelle led in vaccination, while Atlantica and Zootopia grappled with high case numbers.

title: The pace picks up
text: Midway, Arendelle and Corona advanced, but Atlantica and Zootopia still faced high case counts.

title: The current status
text: By now, Arendelle, Agrabah, and Corona achieved high vaccination rates. Atlantica and Zootopia showed progress, yet their fight continues.
